title: devsecops: semgrep rules authoring
description: write or refine semgrep rules for your codebase patterns.
context: prefer precise patterns; add tests and autofix where safe.
instructions: 1) propose rule patterns and metavariables. 2) add tests (positive/negative). 3) include autofix if applicable. 4) output yaml for the rule and test cases.
model_tips: minimize false positives; scope by languages/paths.
